content: *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 6 sts cut yarn and draw through last 6 sts fasten_off fold up cuff copyright © 1999 brenda zuk this pattern is for personal use only and may not be reproduced for commercial purposes do not post this pattern to other internet websites file ///users/brendazuk/library/application support/everweb/preview files/a4049766111a49dda2112cd3d4c6c506/freepages/seamanscap html 1/2
